title: The Hotel Collection unveils Christmas party packages
text:
The Hotel Collection unveils Christmas party packages The Hotel Collection unveils Christmas party packages Details Category: 2015 Christmas Venues & Packages near you!   16:00 It’s never too early to start planning your Christmas events. This year The Hotel Collection has launched special packages to help create the perfect Christmas party. As well as dedicated party packages an expert team is available to tailor your celebrations to any size, and for any requirement. 
Rock out with Rudolf at The Hinckley Island Hotel, Leicestershire, from £29.95 per guest: Located within easy reach of the M6, M69 & M1 motorways, this contemporary four-star hotel provides a perfect central location for your Christmas event. This year the hotel has also partnered with Free Radio, whereby a Free Radio DJ hosts the event for you – perfect for those looking to dance the night away. The package includes exclusive competitions and prizes, a four course dinner and of course a DJ set. Prices for this package start at £50.95. Go back in time at The Walton Hall Hotel, Warwickshire, from £29.95 per guest: Experience a taste of luxury at this Grade II listed country house near Stratford-upon-Avon. This year the hotel is transporting guests back in time with a number of themed events, including An Evening With The Mafia (£34.95 per guest), a 1920s-inspired Great Gatsby evening (£44.95) and a Masquerade Party (£44.95 per guest). All packages include a delicious three-course meal, festive novelties and entertainment. Indulge in a night of fire and ice at The Shrigley Hall Hotel, Cheshire, from £40.00per guest: Step into the glamorous surroundings of this 19th century four-star country house hotel, where you will receive a red carpet welcome to kick start your dramatic ‘fire and ice’ party. Guests will enjoy a sumptuous three-course dinner in a lavishly decorated room, filled with flames, snowflakes, icicles, an ice bar and fun photo boards to capture the memories. Related articles
